001package game;
002import java.io.InputStream;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Scanner;
006import javax.swing.Timer;
007
008/**
009 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. 
010 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
011 * 
012 *  This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
013 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that 
014 *  the parser returns.
015 * 
016 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
017 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019) Christophe TARATIBU modified (2025)
018 * @version 2025/2026 (09.01.2026) Christophe TARATIBU
019 */
020public class GameEngine
021{
022    /**Delay between test commands (ms) to let UI refresh images*/
023    private static final int TEST_DELAY_MS = 4000;
024    /** Total game duration in milliseconds */
025    private static final int GAME_DURATION_MS = 600000; // 10 minutes
026    /** Parser used to execute commands */
027    private final Parser aParser;
028    /** User's graphical interface */
029    private UserInterface aGui;
030    /** Attribute used for tests */
031    private boolean aTestMode;
032    /** Player's data */
033    private Player aPlayer;
034    /** Timer used to timegate the party */
035    private Timer aGameTimer;
036    /** Countdown before the end of the game */
037    private Timer aCountdownTimer;
038    /** Time when the game started */
039    private long aGameStartMillis;
040    /** String used to control random behavior in tests */
041    private String aAleaString;
042
043    /**
044     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
045     */
046    public GameEngine()
047    {
048        this("Tetsuma");
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Constructor allowing to pick the player's name.
053     * @param pPlayerName player name
054     */
055    public GameEngine(final String pPlayerName)
056    {
057        this.aParser = new Parser();
058        this.createRooms(pPlayerName);
059        //this.aPreviouRooms = new Stack<>();
060        this.aTestMode = false;
061        this.aAleaString = null;
062    }
063
064    /**
065     *  Returns the player (used in userInterface)
066     *  @return The player
067    */
068    public Player getPlayer(){
069        return this.aPlayer;
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Sets the GUI
074     * @param pUserInterface User Interface 
075     */
076    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
077    {
078        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
079        this.printWelcome();
080        this.startGameTimer();
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * Print out the opening message for the player.
085     */
086    private void printWelcome()
087    {
088        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
089        this.aGui.println( "Welcome to game of The return of Yamata no Orochi, " + this.aPlayer.getName() + "!" );
090        this.aGui.println( "The monster came back to life and you must create a katana to save Japan !." );
091        this.aGui.println("From now, you have to find materials to create the  mythical weapon : Totsuka's blade !");
092        this.aGui.println( "Type 'help' if you need help." );
093        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
094        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
095        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
096            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
097    }
098
099   /**
100     * Create all the rooms and link their exits together.
101     * @param pPlayerName The name of the player
102     */
103    private void createRooms(final String pPlayerName){
104        Room vShirago = new Room("in your village of birth, Shirakawa-go.","./Images/shirakawa.jpg","Shirakawa-go");
105        TransporterRoom vGujoHachi = new TransporterRoom("In the Gujo Hachiman castle.","./Images/gujohachi.jpg","Gujo Hachiman");
106        Room vOsaka = new Room("in the Osaka city.","./Images/Osaka.jpg","Osaka");
107        Room vTsushi = new Room("in the Tsushima island.","./Images/Tsushima.jpg","Tsushima");
108        Room vSeki = new Room("in the Seki blacksmiths village, it's the end of your odyssey.","./Images/seki.jpg","Seki");
109        Room vNara = new Room("in the Nara city known for its deers.","./Images/Nara_fire.jpg","Nara");
110        Room vGinkaku = new Room("in the Ginkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Ginkakuji_fall_2.jpg","Ginkaku-ji");
111        Room vKinkaku = new Room("in the Kinkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Kinkaku.jpg","Kinkaku-ji");
112        Room vYoshino = new Room("in the Yoshino national park, the forest is big here.","./Images/Yoshino_park.jpg","Yoshino");
113        Room vNagoya  = new Room("in the Nagoya city","./Images/Nagoya.jpg","Nagoya");
114        Room vMtFuji = new Room("at the foot of the Mt Fuji.","./Images/MtFuji.jpg","Mt Fuji");
115        Room vTokyo = new Room("in the Tokyo tower, the biggest tower of Japan.","./Images/tokyo_tower.jpg","Tokyo");
116        Room vSapporo = new Room("in the Sapporo city, in the north of Japan.","./Images/sapporo_snow.jpg","Sapporo");
117        Room vAogashi = new Room("in the island of Aogashima, in the middle of the ocean.","./Images/Aogashima.jpg","Aogashima");
118        
119        
120        
121        vShirago.setExit("south", vGujoHachi);
122        vShirago.addItem("Mochi", new Item("A sweety mochi", 1));
123
124        // Osaka : north -> Ginkaku, east -> GujoHachi, south -> Nara, west -> Tsushi
125        vOsaka.setExit("north", vGinkaku);
126        vOsaka.setExit("east", vGujoHachi);
127        vOsaka.setExit("south", vNara);
128        vOsaka.setExit("west", vTsushi);
129        vOsaka.addItem("Anko mochi", new Item("A mochi with anko flavour of Osaka", 2));
130
131        // Ginkaku : east -> Kinkaku, south -> Osaka
132        vGinkaku.setExit("east", vKinkaku);
133        vGinkaku.setExit("south", vOsaka);
134        vGinkaku.addItem("Silver Shigane", new Item("A silver metal used for blade crafting", 3));
135
136        // Kinkaku : south -> Ginkaku
137        vKinkaku.setExit("south", vGinkaku);
138        vKinkaku.addItem("Gold Tamagane", new Item("A golden metal used for blade crafting", 3));
139
140        // Tsushi : north -> Osaka, east -> Seki
141        vTsushi.setExit("north", vOsaka);
142        vTsushi.setExit("east", vSeki);
143        vTsushi.addItem("Ryujin's scale", new Item("A scale impregnated by the sea god's energy", 2));
144
145        // Seki : west -> Tsushi
146        vSeki.setExit("west", vTsushi);
147
148        // Nara : east -> Yoshino
149        vNara.setExit("east", vYoshino);
150        vNara.setTrapDoorExit("south", vOsaka);
151        vNara.addItem("Horn of the deer goddess", new Item("A horn given by the goddess of deers", 2));
152
153        // Yoshino : east -> Nagoya
154        vYoshino.setExit("east", vNagoya);
155        vYoshino.addItem("Bamboo of the holy forest", new Item("A rare type of bamboo which only exists here, used for blade creation", 2));
156
157        // Nagoya : up -> MtFuji, west -> Yoshino
158        vNagoya.setExit("west", vYoshino);
159        vNagoya.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
160        vNagoya.setTrapDoorExit("south", vTokyo);
161        vNagoya.addItem("Habaki",new Item("A copper necklace used for the blade crafting", 4));
162        
163
164        // MtFuji : north -> Sapporo, east -> Tokyo, south -> Nagoya, west -> GujoHachi
165        vMtFuji.setExit("down", vSapporo);
166        vMtFuji.setExit("east", vTokyo);
167        vMtFuji.setExit("south", vNagoya);
168        vMtFuji.setExit("west", vGujoHachi);
169        vNagoya.addItem("Space-time kunai", new Item("A weapon which can send the user to another place",7));
170
171        // Tokyo : west -> Nagoya
172        vTokyo.setExit("west", vNagoya);
173        vTokyo.addItem("Amaterasu's amulet",new Item("An amulet which burns monsters and yokais", 3));
174
175        // Sapporo : south -> Aogashi
176        vSapporo.setExit("south", vAogashi);
177        vSapporo.addItem("Ice dragon's amulet",new Item("An amulet which freezes monsters and yokais", 4));
178
179
180        // Aogashi : north -> Sapporo, south -> Tokyo
181        vAogashi.setExit("north", vSapporo);
182        vAogashi.setExit("south", vTokyo);
183        vAogashi.addItem("Aogashima's salt", new Item("Holy salt used for purifying monsters", 1));
184        this.aPlayer = new Player(pPlayerName);
185        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vShirago);
186
187
188        // Set transporter room destinations
189        vGujoHachi.setDestinations(new ArrayList<Room>(List.of(vTsushi, vSapporo, vAogashi, vGinkaku)));
190
191    }
192
193    /**
194     * Eat an item
195     * @param pCmd The command to process
196     */
197    private void eat(final Command pCmd){
198        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
199            this.aGui.println("Eat what ?");
200            return;
201        }
202        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
203        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
204        if(vItem == null){
205            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
206        } 
207        if (!vItemName.equals("Anko mochi") && !vItemName.equals("Mochi") ){
208            this.aGui.println("You can't eat this item !");
209            return;
210
211        } else if(vItemName.equals("Anko mochi")){
212            this.aPlayer.superPower();
213            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
214            this.aPlayer.setWeight(this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight());
215            this.aGui.println("You have eaten the Anko Mochi ! Your maximum weight has been doubled !");
216        }else if(vItemName.equals("Mochi")){
217            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
218            this.aPlayer.setWeight(this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight());
219            this.aGui.println("You have eaten the mochi, it was really delicious !!!");
220        }
221        
222        return;
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Print out the description of the current room.
227     */
228    private void look(){
229        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
230        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
231            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
232    }
233
234    /**
235     * Go back to the previous room
236     */
237    private void back(){
238        //bleb
239        Room vPreviousRoom = this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoom();
240        //System.out.println("Previous room : " + vPreviousRoom.getRoomName());
241        if(vPreviousRoom == null || this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().isExit(vPreviousRoom)){
242            this.aGui.println("You can't go back any further !");
243            this.aPlayer.emptyPreviousRooms();
244            return;
245        }
246        else{
247            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vPreviousRoom);
248            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
249            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
250                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
251        }
252    }
253
254    /**
255     * Start (or restart) the global game timer. When it fires, the player loses.
256     */
257    private void startGameTimer(){
258        if (this.aGameTimer != null){
259            this.aGameTimer.stop();
260        }
261        if (this.aCountdownTimer != null){
262            this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
263        }
264        this.aGameStartMillis = System.currentTimeMillis();
265
266        // countdown display each second
267        this.aCountdownTimer = new Timer(1000, e -> {
268            long vRemaining = this.remainingTime();
269            if (vRemaining <= 0){
270                this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
271                // Let the main timer handle loss, just show 00:00 now
272                this.aGui.updateTimerLabel("00:00");
273            } else {
274                this.aGui.updateTimerLabel(this.formatTime(vRemaining));
275            }
276        });
277        this.aCountdownTimer.setRepeats(true);
278        this.aCountdownTimer.start();
279
280        this.aGameTimer = new Timer(GAME_DURATION_MS, e -> {
281            this.aGui.println("Time is up! You lose.");
282            this.endGame();
283        });
284        this.aGameTimer.setRepeats(false);
285        this.aGameTimer.start();
286
287        // initialise display immediately
288        this.aGui.updateTimerLabel(this.formatTime(GAME_DURATION_MS));
289    }
290
291    /**
292     * Calculate remaining milliseconds before time is up.
293     * @return Remaining milliseconds
294     */
295    private long remainingTime(){
296        long vElapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - this.aGameStartMillis;
297        return Math.max(0, GAME_DURATION_MS - vElapsed);
298    }
299
300    /**
301     * Format milliseconds as mm:ss string.
302     * @param pMillis Milliseconds to format
303     * @return Formatted string
304     */
305    private String formatTime(final long pMillis){
306        long vTotalSeconds = pMillis / 1000;
307        long vMinutes = vTotalSeconds / 60;
308        long vSeconds = vTotalSeconds % 60;
309        return String.format("%02d:%02d", vMinutes, vSeconds);
310    }
311
312    /**
313     * Take an item from the room
314     * @param pCmd The command to process
315     */
316    public void take(final Command pCmd){
317        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
318            this.aGui.println("Take what ?");
319            return;
320        }
321        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
322        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItemName);
323        if(vItem == null){
324            this.aGui.println("This item is not here !");
325        } else{
326            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() + vItem.getItemWeight();
327            if(vNewWeight > this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight()){
328                this.aGui.println("You can't take this item, it's too heavy !");
329            } else{
330                this.aPlayer.addItem(vItemName, vItem);
331                this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
332                this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().removeItem(vItemName);
333                this.aGui.println("You have taken the " + vItemName);
334                this.aGui.println(vItem.getItemDescription());
335            }
336        }
337    }
338
339    /**
340     * Drop an item in the room
341     * @param pCmd The command to process
342     */
343    public void drop(final Command pCmd){
344        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
345            this.aGui.println("Drop what ?");
346            return;
347        }
348        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
349        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
350        if(vItem == null){
351            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
352        } else{
353            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
354            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight();
355            this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
356            this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().addItem(vItemName, vItem);
357            this.aGui.println("You have dropped the " + vItemName);
358        }
359    }
360    /**
361     * Show player's inventory
362     */
363    private void playerInventory(){
364        this.aGui.println("You have : \n" + this.aPlayer.getItems());
365        this.aGui.println("Current weight : " + this.aPlayer.getWeight() + " / " + this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight());
366       
367    }
368
369    /**
370     * Plant the kunai in the current room
371     * @param pCmd The command to process
372     */
373    private void plant(final Command pCmd){
374        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
375            this.aGui.println("Plant what ?");
376            return;
377        }
378        String vText = pCmd.getSecondWord();
379        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vText);
380        if(vItem == null){
381            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !, you can't write your current place.");
382            return;
383
384        } else if(vText.equals("Space-time kunai")){
385            this.aPlayer.setPlantedRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
386            this.aGui.println("You have used the Space-time kunai to write your current place :" + this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getRoomName());
387            return;
388
389        } else {
390            this.aGui.println("You can't write with this item !");
391            return;
392        }
393        
394    }
395
396    /**
397     * Use the power of planted kunai to go to the room
398     * @param pCmd The command to process
399     */
400    private void use(final Command pCmd){
401        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
402            this.aGui.println("Use what ?");
403            return;
404        }
405        String vText = pCmd.getSecondWord();
406        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vText);
407        if(vItem == null){
408            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
409            return;
410
411        } else if(vText.equals("Space-time kunai")){
412            Room vPlantedRoom = this.aPlayer.getPlantedRoom();
413            if(vPlantedRoom == null){
414                this.aGui.println("You haven't planted any place yet !");
415                return;
416                
417            } else {
418               //this.aPlayer.addPreviousRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
419                this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vPlantedRoom);
420                this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
421                if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
422                    this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
423                Command vForceCmd = new Command("drop", "Space-time kunai"); 
424                this.drop(vForceCmd);
425                this.aGui.println("You have used the Space-time kunai to go back to the planted place.");
426                this.aGui.println("Once used, the kunai vanishes !");
427                this.aPlayer.emptyPreviousRooms();
428                this.winAndForge(vPlantedRoom);
429                this.aPlayer.resetPlantedRoom();
430                return;
431            }
432
433        } else {
434            this.aGui.println("You can't use this item !");
435            return;
436        }
437        
438    }
439
440    /**
441     * Manage the alea command to control random behavior in tests.
442     * - alea string: memorizes the string to determine the next random draw
443     * - alea: clears the string to allow truly random draws
444     * This command should only be used in test mode.
445     * @param pCmd The command to process
446     */
447    private void alea(final Command pCmd){
448        if (!this.aTestMode) {
449            this.aGui.println("The 'alea' command can only be used in test mode.");
450            return;
451        }
452        
453        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
454            // No parameter: clear the alea string
455            this.aAleaString = null;
456            this.aGui.println("Random mode restored (alea cleared).");
457        } else {
458            // Parameter provided: memorize it
459            this.aAleaString = pCmd.getSecondWord();
460            this.aGui.println("Alea set to: " + this.aAleaString);
461        }
462    }
463
464
465    /**
466     * Process the command. Return true if the command ends the game, false otherwise.
467     * @param pCmdLine The command to process.
468     */
469    public void interpretCommand(final String pCmdLine) {
470        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCmdLine);
471        Command pCmd = this.aParser.getCommand( pCmdLine );
472        if (pCmd.isUnknown()) {
473            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
474            return;
475        }
476        String vCommandWord = pCmd.getCommandWord();
477        if ("help".equals(vCommandWord)) {
478            this.printHelp();
479
480        } else if ("go".equals(vCommandWord)) {
481            this.goRooms(pCmd);
482
483        } else if ("quit".equals(vCommandWord)) {
484            if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
485                this.aGui.println("Quit what ?");
486            } else {
487                this.endGame();
488            }
489
490        } else if("look".equals(vCommandWord)){
491            this.look();
492
493        } else if ("eat".equals(vCommandWord)){
494            this.eat(pCmd);
495
496        } else if ("back".equals(vCommandWord)){
497            this.back();
498
499        } else if("test".equals(vCommandWord)){
500            this.testFile(pCmd);
501
502        } else if("take".equals(vCommandWord)){
503            this.take(pCmd);
504
505        } else if("drop".equals(vCommandWord)){
506            this.drop(pCmd);
507
508        } else if("items".equals(vCommandWord)){
509            this.playerInventory();
510
511        } else if("plant".equals(vCommandWord)){
512            this.plant(pCmd);
513
514        } else if("use".equals(vCommandWord)){
515            this.use(pCmd);
516
517        } else if("alea".equals(vCommandWord)){
518            this.alea(pCmd);
519
520        } else {
521            System.out.println("Unknown command word: " + vCommandWord);
522            return;
523        }
524    }
525
526    
527    /**
528     * Launch a test file
529     * @param pCommand The command to process
530     */
531    private void testFile (final Command pCommand){
532        if (this.aTestMode) {
533            this.aGui.println("A test is already running, please wait.");
534            return;
535        }
536        if(pCommand.hasSecondWord() == false){
537            this.aGui.println("Error : you must specify a file name !");
538            return;
539        }
540      
541        String vFileName = pCommand.getSecondWord();
542        vFileName+=".txt";
543        InputStream vInputStream = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(vFileName);
544        if (vInputStream == null){
545            this.aGui.println("Error : file not found !");
546            return;
547        }
548
549        List<String> vCommands = new ArrayList<>();
550        try (Scanner vScanner = new Scanner(vInputStream)){
551            while (vScanner.hasNextLine()){
552                String vLine = vScanner.nextLine().trim();
553                // Ignore empty lines and comments (starting with // or #)
554                if (!vLine.isEmpty() && !vLine.startsWith("//") && !vLine.startsWith("#")){
555                    vCommands.add(vLine);
556                }
557            }
558        }
559
560        if (vCommands.isEmpty()){
561            this.aGui.println("The test file is empty or only contains comments.");
562            return;
563        }
564
565        this.aTestMode = true;
566        final int[] vIndex = {0};
567        final Timer vTimer = new Timer(TEST_DELAY_MS, null);
568        vTimer.addActionListener(ev -> {
569            if (vIndex[0] < vCommands.size()){
570                String vNext = vCommands.get(vIndex[0]++);
571                this.interpretCommand(vNext);
572            } else {
573                vTimer.stop();
574                this.aTestMode = false;
575                this.aGui.println("Test finished.");
576            }
577        });
578        vTimer.setRepeats(true);
579        vTimer.start();
580    }
581
582   
583
584    // implementations of user commands:
585
586   /**
587     * Print out some help information.
588     * Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.
589     */
590    public void printHelp(){
591        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.\r\n" + //
592                        "You wander around Japan.\r\n" + //
593                        "\r\n" + //
594                        "Your command words are:\r\n" +  this.aParser.showCommands() //
595                        );
596       
597    }
598
599    /**
600     * Check if the player has won and forges the blade if so.
601     * @param pRoom The current room of the player
602     */
603    public void winAndForge(final Room pRoom){
604        String aRoomName = pRoom.getRoomName();
605        if(aRoomName.equals("Seki")){
606            this.aGui.println("You've arrived at your destination.");
607            this.aGui.println("The blacksmith chief needs all of the objects you've found");
608            List<String> vPlayerItems = this.aPlayer.getInventoryItemNames();
609            List<String> vItemsBlade = new ArrayList<String>(List.of("Silver Shigane","Gold Tamagane",
610            "Ryujin's scale","Horn of the deer goddess","Bamboo of the holy forest","Habaki","Aogashima's salt"
611            ));
612            if(vPlayerItems.containsAll(vItemsBlade) ){
613                this.aGui.println("You got all of the items, the blade was created and given to Susanoo !");
614                this.aGui.println("You've won !");
615                this.endGame();
616            } else {
617                this.aGui.println("Some items are missing, you need to find them quickly !");
618                this.aGui.println("The monster is coming! Hurry up !");
619            }
620        }else {
621            return;
622        }
623    }
624
625    /**
626     * Go to the room in the given direction. If there is no room in that
627     * direction, print an error message.
628     * @param pCmd the command to process (should contain "go" and a direction).
629     */
630    private void goRooms(Command pCmd){
631        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
632            System.out.println("Go where ?");
633            return;
634        }
635
636        String vDirection = pCmd.getSecondWord();
637        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
638        if(vNextRoom == null){
639            this.aGui.println("There's no door");
640
641        } else {
642            this.aPlayer.addPreviousRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
643            // If the next room is a transporter room, choose a random room among its possible rooms
644            if (vNextRoom instanceof TransporterRoom){
645                TransporterRoom vTransporterRoom = (TransporterRoom) vNextRoom;
646                this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vTransporterRoom);
647                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
648                if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
649                    this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
650                }
651                Timer vRandomTimer = new Timer(4000, e -> {
652                    int vRngNumber;
653                    if (this.aAleaString != null) {
654                        // Use the alea string to determine the room
655                        vRngNumber = vTransporterRoom.getIndexForRoomName(this.aAleaString);
656                        if (vRngNumber == -1) {
657                            // Room name not found, use random
658                            this.aGui.println("Warning: Room '" + this.aAleaString + "' not found in destinations. Using random.");
659                            vRngNumber = vTransporterRoom.getRngNumber();
660                        }
661                        // Consume the alea string after use
662                        this.aAleaString = null;
663                    } else {
664                        // No alea string, use truly random
665                        vRngNumber = vTransporterRoom.getRngNumber();
666                    }
667                    vTransporterRoom.setChosenRoom(vRngNumber);
668                    Room vChosenRoom = vTransporterRoom.getChosenRoom();
669                    this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vChosenRoom);
670                    this.aGui.println("The transporter room teleports you to another place !");
671                    this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
672                    if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
673                        this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
674                    }
675                    vTransporterRoom.resetChosenRoom();
676                });
677                this.aPlayer.emptyPreviousRooms();
678                vRandomTimer.setRepeats(false);
679                vRandomTimer.start();
680                return;
681            }
682            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
683            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
684            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
685                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() ); 
686            this.winAndForge(vNextRoom);
687
688        }
689    }
690
691    
692
693
694    /**
695     * End the game
696     */
697    public void endGame(){
698        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
699        this.aGui.enable( false );
700        if (this.aGameTimer != null){
701            this.aGameTimer.stop();
702        }
703        if (this.aCountdownTimer != null){
704            this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
705        }
706    }
707
708    /**
709     * Get item names present in the current room (for UI selection)
710     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
711     */
712    public List<String> getCurrentRoomItemNames(){
713        return this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItemNames();
714    }
715
716    /**
717     * Get item names present in player's inventory (for UI selection)
718     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
719     */
720    public List<String> getPlayerItemNames(){
721        return this.aPlayer.getInventoryItemNames();
722    }
723
724}
